title: Complete your account registration
prompt: Please enter your email address to complete your account registration

processing.title: You have completed your account registration. Please wait a moment without closing the page.
processing.message: If the account registration is not completed after a while, please try [Account Registration](/signup) again.

password.label: Password
password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters

success.title: Account registration has been completed.
success.message: You may close this page if you wish. You can also check [your profile](/profile)

error: Account registration failed. Please try [Account Registration](/signup) again.
